intro:
Flirt at the pool and unlock exclusive images.
Jump in and play now!
description:
Explore the hottest summer as you try to flirt with irresistible girls at the pool… and protect their hearts from any emotional splash.

Combine daring questions with dynamic aquatic defense gameplay to unlock suggestive images and unexpected endings.

Discover how each girl reacts to your answers, your moves, and your tactics under the sun. Do you have the charm (and the reflexes) to rule the pool?


Features:

● Refreshing dual gameplay: Switch between flirty Q&A and defense mode, where you must block “attacks” (splashes, pesky floaties, intruders) to unlock new scenes.

● Suggestive images and unique moments: Earn their trust and uncover special situations as you advance through each route.

● Get to know their personality: Every answer reveals each girl’s tastes, limits, and secrets—from the shy mermaid to the selfie queen.

● Multiple endings: It all depends on how many questions you get right, how well you protect her heart, and how you read her signals.

● A secret, spicy question: Reach question 150 to reveal a special final moment by the pool.


Can you keep your cool, dodge the splashes, and win their hearts under the sun?

Dive into this adventure where strategy, humor, and romance go hand in hand!
